english.segment1: Addicted to razors. Lashes to saviors. Glued to the monitor. Trained behavior
english.segment2: Reduced to a number. Mechanic enslavement. A virtual prison. Selected detainment
english.segment3: A gradual nightmare. Suicidal impulse. A cycle of habit. Undeniable loss
english.segment4: Breathing by wire. A network of heroes. Processing data as ones and zeros
english.segment5: Carry me through the wires. Bury me in the screen. Shift me into this fixation. Cling to the machine. This is now your world, and you barely made it. Did you think that it would cradle you until you were asleep forever?. Did you?. Carry me through the wires. Bury me in the screen. Shift me into this fixation. Cling to the machine. This is now your world, and you barely made it. Did you think that it would cradle you until you were asleep forever?. Did you?
